links.title: Show the current user
links.description: Show the details of the signed in user. Returns HTTP 200 (OK).

links.title: Show (explicit)
links.description: Show the details of a specific user. Returns HTTP 200 (OK).

links.title: Show (inferred)
links.description: Show the details of a specific user. If the :user_id parameter is a user's ID, it responds with a user. Returns HTTP 200 (OK).

links.title: Show Repositories
links.description: Show the repositories that a specific user owns. Returns HTTP 200 (OK).
